io.micronaut.inject.annotation

Interface NamedAnnotationMapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotationMapper<java.lang.annotation.Annotation>, Named
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityIntrospectedAnnotationMapper, JsonCreatorAnnotationMapper, KotlinNotNullMapper, KotlinNullableMapper, MappedSuperClassIntrospectionMapper, PersistenceContextAnnotationMapper, TimedAnnotationMapper

    public interface NamedAnnotationMapper
extends AnnotationMapper<java.lang.annotation.Annotation>, Named
    A named AnnotationMapper operates against any named annotation, and does not require the annotation to be on the annotation processor classpath.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
